tool_description: Constructs optimized database queries based on search criteria including skills, experience, location, and other candidate attributes with support for complex boolean operations.

required_skills.description: List of required technical or soft skills

preferred_skills.description: List of preferred but not mandatory skills

remote_work_acceptable.description: Whether remote work candidates are acceptable

query_operator.description: Boolean operator for combining criteria (AND, OR)

result_limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-1000)

error_messages: Invalid experience range: min_experience_years must be <= max_experience_years and both within 0-50
Invalid query operator: Use either 'AND' or 'OR'
Invalid result limit: Must be between 1 and 1000
Empty search criteria: At least one search parameter must be provided
Invalid education level: Use standard education level terms
usage: Specify search criteria using any combination of skills, experience, location, and other parameters. Use query_operator to control how criteria are combined. Set result_limit to control output size.

search_parameters_used.description: List of search parameters included in query
